title: Commission Regulation (EEC) No 654/89 of 14 March 1989 amending Regulation (EEC) No 828/87 specifying products in the beef and veal sector which are eligible for buying in
header:
COMMISSION  REGULATION (EEC) No 654/89
of 14 March 1989
amending Regulation (EEC) No 828/87 specifying products in the beef and veal sector which are eligible for buying in
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The Annex to Regulation (EEC) No 828/87 is replaced by the Annex to this Regulation.

This Regulation shall enter into force on 20 March 1989.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 14 March 1989.
For the Commission
Ray MAC SHARRY
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 148, 28. 6. 1968, p. 24.
(2) OJ No L 61, 4. 3. 1989, p. 43.
(3) OJ No L 80, 24. 3. 1987, p. 8.
(4) OJ No L 213, 6. 8. 1988, p. 44.
(5) OJ No L 123, 7. 5. 1981, p. 3.
ANEXO - BILAG - ANHANG - PARARTIMA - ANNEX - ANNEXE - ALLEGATO -  BIJLAGE - ANEXO
